game.title: The Lost Key Quest
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure using a mysterious key.
game.description: You have been tasked to search for a lost key that will unlock a secret chamber. Follow the map and clues given by the village elder.

task.objective: Search the old library for a clue about the key's location.
task.description: Look in the history section, possibly under 'Ancient Rites and Traditions'.

task.objective: Visit the ruins of the ancient temple to find a second clue.
task.description: Search among the broken statues and pillars for any markings or engravings.

task.objective: Meet with the mysterious hermit in the nearby forest, he may hold the key.
task.description: Ask him about the legend of the lost key and show him your findings so far.
